mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.role, u.login_name, u.`code`, u.phone, g.`name` gname, ( SELECT NAME FROM sys_company WHERE id IN ( c.company_id ) ) onename, c.`name` twoname, d.`name` dname, u.`status` FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_company c ON u.companytwo_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_group g ON u.group_id = g.id WHERE u.`status` = 0 AND u.id = #{uid}
select id,user_name from sys_user where dept_id = #{did}
SELECT e.eq_id id, e.camera_sn sn, p.`name`, p.address, p.head, p.hon, p.username FROM sys_eq e LEFT JOIN sys_project p ON e.p_id = p.id
